ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: (Product_s__c = TRUE && ISBLANK(Product_Team__c)) || ( Geography__c = TRUE && ISBLANK( Geography_Team__c )) || ( Senior_Management__c = TRUE && ISBLANK( Senior_Management_Team__c )) || ( Coverage_Officer_s__c = TRUE && ISBLANK( Coverage_Officer_Team__c ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If Product, Geography, Senior Management, or Coverage Officer are checked, please provide teams in relevant text areas.
